Signs and Symptoms Approximate number of patients (when available) Stroke 5% Ataxia - Autosomal recessive inheritance - Cerebral edema - Coma - Episodic ammonia intoxication - Failure to thrive - Hepatomegaly - Hyperammonemia - Hyperglutaminemia - Hypoargininemia - Intellectual disability - Irritability - Lethargy - Neonatal onset - Oroticaciduria - Phenotypic variability - Protein avoidance - Respiratory alkalosis - Seizures - Vomiting - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected info
